trans-unit.source: Function Decorators
trans-unit.target: 功能装饰剂

trans-unit.source: Here the first iterations of the loop will be able to perform the expensive operation, until the shared quota of 1 second runs out and then the remaining iterations will perform the cheaper alternative.
trans-unit.target: 在这里,循环的第一个迭代将能够执行昂贵的操作,直到1秒的共享配额用完,然后剩下的迭代将执行更便宜的选择。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Interruptingcow can be used both as inline with-statements, as shown in the above examples, as well as function decorator:
trans-unit.target: Interruptingcow既可以作为inline with-statements使用,如上例所示,也可以作为函数装饰器使用。

trans-unit.source: Interruptingcow is a generic utility that can relatively gracefully interrupt your Python code when it doesn’t execute within a specific number of seconds:
trans-unit.target: Interruptingcow是一个通用实用程序，当它在特定的秒数内未执行时，可以相对优雅地中断您的Python代码：

trans-unit.source: Interruptingcow is fully reentrant, which means that you can have nested timeouts:
trans-unit.target: Interruptingcow是完全重入的,这意味着你可以有嵌套的超时。

trans-unit.source: Interruptingcow uses
trans-unit.target: 中断牛使用

trans-unit.source: Nested timeouts allow a large outer timeout to contain smaller timeouts. If the inner timeout is larger than the outer timeout, it is treated as a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套超时允许一个大的外部超时包含较小的超时。如果内部超时大于外部超时,则被视为无操作。

trans-unit.source: Python signal handlers only apply to the main thread, so you cannot use this from other threads
trans-unit.target: Python信号处理程序只适用于主线程,所以你不能在其他线程中使用它。
